short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dropshipify is a tool that helps you with all the dropshipping needs for your Shopify store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dropshipify is an essential tool designed to streamline and simplify your dropshipping operations for your Shopify store. This extension provides a range of features to help you manage product imports, translations, and categorization efficiently.

Key Features:

Product Import: Easily import products from various sources into your Shopify store.
Product Translation: Translate product descriptions into multiple languages to cater to an international customer base.
Product Categorization: Organize your products by adding them to specific collections within your store.
User Dashboard: Access user information including Discord name, email, license key, and license expiration date.
Product Overview: View statistics and trends of imported products through visual charts and summaries.
Dropshipify aims to save you time and increase your efficiency, allowing you to focus on growing your business. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced dropshipper, this tool offers intuitive and powerful features to support your dropshipping needs.
